translated: Federico García Lorca was born June 5, 1898 in Fuente Vaqueros and died August 19, 1936 in Viznar is a poet, playwright, painter, pianist and Spanish composer, who died during the Spanish Civil War.
original: Federico García Lorca né le 5 juin 1898 à Fuente Vaqueros et mort le 19 août 1936 à Viznar est un poète, dramaturge, peintre, pianiste et compositeur espagnol, mort pendant la guerre civile espagnole.
